trigger.Name: StartFadeEffect
trigger.script:
SaveAllToleranceStatus(RS_NEUTRAL)
EnableGodMode()
Fly("start_game", CINEMATIC_NO_AIM, 0, 0.1, 0, 1) StartCinematic() UpdateCinematic( 1 )
AddCinematicMessage(77773, 0)
TActivate("trSilenceMusic") TActivate("StartFadeEffect_End")
trigger:Deactivate()

trigger.Name: StartFadeEffect_End
trigger.script:
RestoreAllToleranceStatus() DisableGodMode() StopPlayingCustomMusic()
local player_car = GetVar("PlayerCar").AsString
local vehP = GetPlayerVehicle() local PlfCoor = vehP:GetPosition() if vehP then if player_car == "Bug" then CreateEffectTTLed("ET_S_ENGINE_BUG_STARTING", PlfCoor, Quaternion(0.0000, 0.0000, 0.0000, 0.0000), 1538) elseif player_car == "Molokovoz" then CreateEffectTTLed("ET_S_ENGINE_MOLOKOVOZ_STARTING", PlfCoor, Quaternion(0.0000, 0.0000, 0.0000, 0.0000), 1142) elseif player_car == "Ural" then CreateEffectTTLed("ET_S_ENGINE_URAL_STARTING", PlfCoor, Quaternion(0.0000, 0.0000, 0.0000, 0.0000), 1272) elseif player_car == "Belaz" then CreateEffectTTLed("ET_S_ENGINE_BELAZ"..random(2).."_STARTING", PlfCoor, Quaternion(0.0000, 0.0000, 0.0000, 0.0000), 3200) elseif player_car == "Mirotvorec" then CreateEffectTTLed("ET_S_ENGINE_MIROTVOREC_STARTING", PlfCoor, Quaternion(0.0000, 0.0000, 0.0000, 0.0000), 923) elseif player_car == "Cruiser" then CreateEffectTTLed("ET_S_ENGINE_CRUISER_STARTING", PlfCoor, Quaternion(0.0000, 0.0000, 0.0000, 0.0000), 930) end end
if GetVar("SpawnPlayer").AsInt==1 then AddFadingMsgByStrIdFormatted("fm_player_search_exit_zone", "Exits2LocationR1M1") else AddFadingMsgByStrIdFormatted("fm_player_search_exit_zone", "Exits1LocationR1M1") end
TActivate("MessageRaid") TActivate("TimerRaidStart") TActivate("CreatePMC") TActivate("IfRaidCountForQuest")
AllowSave(false)
SetCameraBehindPlayerVehicle()
trigger:Deactivate()

trigger.Name: cutTimeRaid
trigger.script:
local Plf = GetPlayerVehicle() local PlfID = GetPlayerVehicleId() local PlfCoor = Plf:GetPosition() PlfCoor.y = PlfCoor.y + 25*0.74 PlfCoor.z = PlfCoor.z + 25*0.74
SaveAllToleranceStatus(RS_NEUTRAL) EnableGodMode()
Plf:SetCustomLinearVelocity(0) Plf:SetThrottle(0)
FlyAround(1, 0, 15, 7, PlfCoor, PlfID, 1, 1) StartCinematic() UpdateCinematic(1)
AddCinematicMessage(1,0)
TActivate("cutTimeRaid_End") TDeactivate("IfChargeCar") TActivate("IfPlayerDieForQuest")
trigger:Deactivate()

trigger.Name: cutTimeRaidFade
trigger.script:
SaveAllToleranceStatus(RS_NEUTRAL) EnableGodMode()
Fly("start_game", CINEMATIC_NO_AIM, 0, 0.5, 1, 0) StartCinematic()
AddCinematicMessage(77773, 0)
TActivate("cutTimeRaid_End")
trigger:Deactivate()

trigger.Name: cutTimeRaid_End
trigger.script:
RestoreAllToleranceStatus() DisableGodMode()
local pl = GetPlayerVehicle() local plProt = pl:GetProperty("Prototype").AsString local skin = pl:GetSkin() SetVar("PlayerSkin", skin) AddPlayerNewVehicle(plProt)
TActivate("UpdateCabinBasket") TActivate("ExitFadeEffect")
trigger:Deactivate()

trigger.Name: UpdateCabinBasket
trigger.script: local pl = GetPlayerVehicle() if pl then pl:SetNewPart("CABIN",GetVar("PlayerCabin").AsString) pl:SetNewPart("BASKET",GetVar("PlayerBasket").AsString) pl:SetSkin(GetVar("PlayerSkin").AsInt) pl:TakeOffAllGuns() end trigger:Deactivate()

trigger.Name: FakePlayerDead
trigger.script: TActivate("PlayerCarConfiguration") TActivate("cutPlayerDead") TDeactivate("TimerRaid") TDeactivate("AirDropProbability") TDeactivate("IfChargeCar") TActivate("IfPlayerDieForQuest") trigger:Deactivate()

trigger.Name: cutPlayerDead
trigger.script:
local pl = GetPlayerVehicle() local plProt = pl:GetProperty("Prototype").AsString local plPos = pl:GetPosition() local plPos2 = pl:GetPosition() local plRot = pl:GetRotation()
plPos2.x = plPos2.x + 150 plPos2.z = plPos2.z + 150
GetPlayerVehicle():setGodMode(1) GetPlayerVehicle():SetPosition(CVector(plPos2)) GetPlayerVehicle():SetThrottle(0) GetPlayerVehicle():SetCustomLinearVelocity(0)
SaveAllToleranceStatus(RS_NEUTRAL)
CreateVehicleEx(plProt,"fakePlayerCar",(plPos), 1100)
CreateEffectInsertedInRemove("ET_S_DEATH", plPos, Quaternion(0, 0, 0, 1), true)
local fakePlayer = GetEntityByName("fakePlayerCar") local objid = fakePlayer:GetId() local objPos = fakePlayer:GetPosition() if fakePlayer then fakePlayer:SetRotation(plRot) fakePlayer:TakeOffAllGuns() if not(GetVar("PlayerCabin").AsString == "0") and not(GetVar("PlayerBasket").AsString == "0") then fakePlayer:SetNewPart("CABIN", GetVar("PlayerCabin").AsString) fakePlayer:SetNewPart("BASKET", GetVar("PlayerBasket").AsString) end fakePlayer:SetSkin(-1) fakePlayer:setGodMode(1) CreateNewSgNodeObject("ET_PS_VEH_EXP2_MED", "exp01", -1, -1, plPos, Quaternion(0, 0, 0, 1), 1) CreateNewSgNodeObject("ET_PS_VEH_EXP_CAB", "exp02", -1, -1, plPos, Quaternion(0, 0, 0, 1), 1) fakePlayer:SetThrottle(0) fakePlayer:SetCustomLinearVelocity(0) end
objPos.y = objPos.y + 20 objPos.z = objPos.z + 15 FlyAround(5, 0.5, 15, 10, objPos, objid, 0, 1, "", 0) StartCinematic() UpdateCinematic(1)
RuleConsole("g_postEffect Dead") TActivate("cutPlayerDead_End")
trigger:Deactivate()

trigger.Name: cutPlayerDead_End
trigger.script:
RestoreAllToleranceStatus()
local obj = getObj("yashik") if obj then obj:Remove() end
for i=1,2 do local fx = getObj("exp0"..i) if fx then fx:Remove() end end
local veh = getObj("fakePlayerCar") if veh then veh:Remove() end
if GetVar("PlayerCar").AsString == "Bug" then AddPlayerNewVehicle("BugChassis") elseif GetVar("PlayerCar").AsString == "Molokovoz" then AddPlayerNewVehicle("MolokovozChassis") elseif GetVar("PlayerCar").AsString == "Ural" then AddPlayerNewVehicle("UralChassis") elseif GetVar("PlayerCar").AsString == "Belaz" then AddPlayerNewVehicle("BelazChassis") elseif GetVar("PlayerCar").AsString == "Mirotvorec" then AddPlayerNewVehicle("MirotvorecChassis") elseif GetVar("PlayerCar").AsString == "Cruiser" then AddPlayerNewVehicle("CruiserChassis") end
GetPlayerVehicle():setGodMode(1)
RuleConsole("g_postEffect DeadOff") UpdateWeather()
TActivate("ExitFadeEffect")
trigger:Deactivate()

trigger.Name: ExitFadeEffect
trigger.script:
SaveAllToleranceStatus(RS_NEUTRAL) EnableGodMode()
Fly("start_game", CINEMATIC_NO_AIM, 0, 0.1, 0, 1) StartCinematic()
AddCinematicMessage(77773, 0)
TActivate("ExitFadeEffect_End") TActivate("ExitToMap")
trigger:Deactivate()

trigger.Name: cutExitR4M1
trigger.script:
SaveAllToleranceStatus(RS_NEUTRAL)
local Plf = GetPlayerVehicle() Plf:SetThrottle(0) Plf:SetCustomLinearVelocity(0) Plf:SetGamePositionOnGround(CVector(3727.149, 343.862, 2805.792)) Plf:SetRotation(Quaternion(-0.010, -0.111, 0.000, 0.994)) Plf:SetExternalPathByName("player_exitR4M1")
local PlfID = GetPlayerVehicleId() local PlfCoor = Plf:GetPosition() PlfCoor.y = PlfCoor.y + 25*0.74 PlfCoor.z = PlfCoor.z + 25*0.74
FlyAround(1, 0, 25, 6, PlfCoor, PlfID, 1, 1) StartCinematic() UpdateCinematic(1)
TActivate("cutExitR4M1_End")
trigger:Deactivate()

trigger.Name: cutExitR4M1_End
trigger.script:
RestoreAllToleranceStatus()
local Plf = GetPlayerVehicle() if Plf then Plf:PlaceToEndOfPath("player_exitR4M1") Plf:SetGamePositionOnGround(CVector(3719.013, 343.507, 2849.400)) Plf:SetRotation(Quaternion(-0.011, -0.054, 0.001, 0.998)) end
SetCameraBehindPlayerVehicle()
trigger:Deactivate()
